```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
list.files("../data")


homicides <- homicide-data.csv %>% 
  mutate(city_name = paste(city, state, sep= ","))
head(homicides)

```

```{r}


unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  group_by(city_name) %>% 
  count(disposition) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = disposition, values_from = n) %>% 
  mutate(unsolved_homicides = sum(c_across(2:3), na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  mutate(total_homicides = sum(c_across(1:3), na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  select(city_name, unsolved_homicides, total_homicides)
head(unsolved)

```

```{r}
MD <- unsolved %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore,MD")

```
